pages.text: Like other modifications that have tools, you can use the $(l:pedestals:tools/filtertool)Filter Tool$() in the offhand when extracting Filters from the pedestal.

pages.title: Filters (Setup)
pages.text: Filters can be setup by Crouch + Right Clicking an inventory of items, and Right Clicking in the air to swap Whitelist / Blacklist. See $(l:pedestals:getting_started/getting_started_filtering/filter_overview)Filter Overview$() for more detailed info regarding setup.

pages.title: Filters (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting filters, they will be placed on the pedestal, as a white or black band, to indicate if its a whitelist or blacklist filter. $(br) Inserting Filters can be done with items in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one Filter from your Offhand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Filters (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting filters, put any Filter or the $(l:pedestals:tools/filtertool)Filter Tool$() in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted filter from the pedestal.

pages.title: Filter (Pedestal Info)
pages.text: When right clicking the $(l:pedestals:tools/filtertool)Filter Tool$() on the pedestal, your chat will display some info about the currently insert filter.
